ModSettings.name: Endurance Fix
ModSettings.title: [Util] Endurance Fix
ModSettings.description:
Endurance Spell Fix: v1.0.8
Dependencies: UserUtility (requires the installation of this Mod prior to use)
This is a fix to the Endurance spell which should also convey a construction bonus when cast on engineers, effectively DOUBLING their construction rate.
See https://masterofmagic.fandom.com/wiki/Endurance
This Mod corrects the oversight and adds the missing Engineering construction bonus.
Verbose logging can be controlled via the 'bLoggingEnabled' variable in the following script file:
EnchantmentScripts_END.cs
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
